plot: Canadian National Barista Champion Sammy Piccolo wants to make your daily coffee an uncommon pleasure. In Sammy's mind, if you do it everyday, why not make something that tastes delicious?
title: The Passion of the Cup
plot_es: Canadian National Barista Champion Sammy Piccolo wants to make your daily coffee an uncommon pleasure. In Sammy's mind, if you do it everyday, why not make something that tastes delicious?
plot_en: Canadian National Barista Champion Sammy Piccolo wants to make your daily coffee an uncommon pleasure. In Sammy's mind, if you do it everyday, why not make something that tastes delicious?
